title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 95 - REGULATIONS GOVERNING AN ACTUARIAL OPINION AND MEMORANDUM
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 95 - REGULATIONS GOVERNING AN ACTUARIAL OPINION AND MEMORANDUM
State Regulations
§ 95.0 - [Repealed]

§ 95.2 - Authority
§ 95.3 - Scope
§ 95.4 - Definitions
§ 95.5 - General requirements
§ 95.6 - Required opinions
§ 95.7 - Statement of actuarial opinion not including an asset adequacy analysis
§ 95.8 - Statement of actuarial opinion based on an asset adequacy analysis
§ 95.9 - Description of an actuarial memorandum
§ 95.10 - Additional considerations for analysis
§ 95.11 - Minimum reserve requirements with and without an acceptable actuarial opinion and memorandum
§ 95.12 - Severability
§ 95.13 to 95.16 - [Repealed]
§ 95.17 - [Repealed]
§ 95.18 to 95.19 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 95

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§107, 201, 301, 308, 310, 1301, 1303, 1304, 4217, 4232, 4240

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
